abstract: JPMorgan Chase is threatening to move thousands of employees from Midtown to Stamford, Conn., if New York officials do not give it a larger subsidy package to build a 50-story skyscraper near ground zero, The New York Times reported.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase is threatening to move thousands of employees from Midtown to Stamford, Conn., if New York officials do not give it a larger subsidy package to build a 50-story skyscraper near ground zero, The New York Times reported.

headline.main: Chase Says It Will Move if New York Balks on Subsidies
